name: Freedom
flavor: Unhindered by armor you dart to and fro across the battlefield, easily weaving past foes' advances. The Freedom Discipline provides many options that enhance a creature's Movement, provide various Safe Movement options, or allow them to easily avoid terrain with Leaping, allowing them to more easily traverse the battlefield. In addition, many potent Evade Reactions are present in this Discipline, as well as easy ways to generate Reflex.

stances.name: Acrobat Style
stances.desc: You easily duck and roll about the battlefield, making full use of your unarmored body.
stances.accumulate: While wearing no armor, whenever you  provoke a _Punish_ Attack while _Leaping_ gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: While wearing no armor all _Leaping_ Movement you make is _Safe_. Once per Turn, you may count up to a _Step_ worth of _Movement_ as _Leaping_ without paying any additional cost.

stances.name: Instinct Style
stances.desc: You have honed your defenses to work while wearing no armor, dodging attacks by a razor-thin margin.
stances.accumulate: While wearing no armor whenever you are _Missed_/_Grazed_ with an _Attack_ gain 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_.
stances.effect: While wearing no armor, once per _Phase_, you may pay 1 _Reflex_ to take an additional _Reaction_ so long as at least one _Reaction_ that turn is an _Evade_ Reaction.

stances.name: Tumbler Style
stances.desc: Elevated terrain is no issue to you. You can leap about the battlefield easily, ignoring such concerns.
stances.accumulate: While wearing no armor, whenever you attack a foe on a lower _Elevation_ gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: While wearing no armor you may move up _Elevation_ that is only 1 higher with no _Movement_ penalty. When _Falling_, reduce the distance by 1.

techniques.name: Agile Counter
techniques.desc: As an attack narrowly misses you slip past a foe's guard to make a strike.
techniques.trigger: An adjacent enemy _Misses_/_Grazes_ with an Attack against you.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Reflex_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
techniques.effect: You may immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.
techniques.special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes None.

techniques.name: Leaping Feint
techniques.desc: You leap over a foe, landing on the opposite side to deliver a might blow.
techniques.reqs: Must be Attached to a Single Target Strik and No Armor Worn.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. After resolving this Technique's Movement, you may _Leaping_ Step. If you _Move_ directly through a creature's space, land on the opposite side, and they do not _Hit_/_Crit_ you with a _Punish_ Attack, grant yourself _Advantage_ on the Attached Strike against that creature. You must use the Attached Strike's Movement after Attacking.

techniques.name: Tumble
techniques.desc: You roll away from an advancing foe, creating a slight opening.
techniques.trigger: A hostile creature ends their turn adjacent to you.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on the triggering foe.

techniques.name: Quick Step
techniques.desc: Unhindered by armor you move quickly, repositioning at a rapid rate.
techniques.effect: Gain 2 _Reflex_.

techniques.name: Free Run
techniques.desc: You charge forward, using the terrain to accelerate yourself further.
techniques.move:
The movement granted by Free Run determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Step:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Reposition:</ins> Speed 2 
*  <ins>Shift:</ins> Speed 3
*  <ins>Sprint:</ins> Speed 5
techniques.effect: The first time you move adjacent to a Size 1 or larger _Obstacle_ or change _Elevation_, you may immediately take a _Safe_ _Step_ _Movement_. This _Movement_ must be in a straight line directly away from the _Obstacle_/_Elevation_ change.
techniques.special: When _Falling_, reduce the distance by 1 for this _Movement_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may trigger the Effect on another distinct _Obstacle_/_Elevation_ change. You may use this _Boost_ as many times as you can afford, but increase the _Cost_ by 1 each time.

techniques.name: Evasion
techniques.desc: You dive out of the way of an incoming effect, mitigating its effects.
techniques.trigger: You are targeted by a damaging Area effect.
techniques.effect: If the Movement from this effect takes you out of the Area, reduce the _Cost_ to _Negate_ the triggering effect by 1 and halve the damage.
techniques.boost: 1 _Reflex_: Movement is instead Shift. You fall _Prone_ at the end of this Reaction.

techniques.name: Acrobatics
techniques.desc: You quickly get to your feet or adjust your position, leaving no openings for your foes to exploit.
techniques.trigger: Your _Turn_ begins.
techniques.effect: None.

techniques.name: Lightning Reflexes
techniques.desc: You nimbly avoid an attack meant to exploit an opening.
techniques.trigger: A creature makes a _Punish_ Attack against you.
techniques.effect: Resolve the Attack as if it rolled a 5.
techniques.boost:
1 _Reflex_: Inflict _Exposed_ 1 (Any 2 _Focus_/_Reflex_).
1 _Reflex_: Instead, resolve the Attack as if it rolled a 2.

techniques.name: Dodge Roll
techniques.desc: You roll away from an attacker, leaving them potentially striking nothing.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked.
techniques.effect: Resolve your Movement before the foe Attacks and inflict _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_). If they cannot reach you with their remaining Movement the Attacker must either choose a new Target or lose the attack.

name: Juggernaut
flavor: Encased in a heavy shell, none can hope to harm you, much less stop your advance across the battlefield. Juggernauts can easily achieve massive amounts of Guard, fully negate low Damage attacks that lack Pierce, and can deal heavy incidental damage with their armored form. The only true flaw of a Juggernaut is that they have no specific tools to draw fire only to enhance their own damage and survivability.

stances.name: Bludgeon Style
stances.desc: You make use of your sturdy armor to lash out at foes, using your gauntlets as artificial weapons.
stances.accumulate: While wearing Heavy Armor, gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you _Hit_ with an Unarmed Attack or 2 _Momentum_ on a _Crit_.
stances.effect: Deal additional Damage with all Unarmed Weapons equal to the _Guard_ provided by your Armor, but their Speed is increased by 1.
stances.special: While wearing Heavy Armor, Reduce the cost to _Negate_ all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ effects by half the _Guard_ provided by your Armor.

stances.name: Guarded Style
stances.desc: You are an expert at making maximum use of your armor, deflecting more blows than most.
stances.accumulate: While wearing Heavy Armor, gain _Momentum_ equal to the _Guard_ provided by your Armor + 1 at Refresh.
stances.effect: While wearing Heavy Armor, treat your _Guard_ as 1 higher.
stances.special: While wearing Heavy Armor, Reduce the cost to _Negate_ all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ effects by half the _Guard_ provided by your Armor.

stances.name: Unstoppable Style
stances.desc: You rely on the weight of your armor to carry you forward, making it impossible to stop your motion.
stances.effect: While wearing Heavy Armor you may clear _Hobbled_ at the beginning of your turn. In addition, you may add _Rush_ to a Technique to increase your Movement by 1 space for that Turn.
stances.special: While wearing Heavy Armor, Reduce the cost to _Negate_ all _Push_, _Pull_, and _Slide_ effects by half the _Guard_ provided by your Armor.

techniques.name: Armored Blow
techniques.desc: A powerful attack that relies on your armor's protection.
techniques.reqs: Melee Weapon Wielded and Heavy Armor Worn.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Deal additional Damage equal to the _Guard_ provided by your Armor.
techniques.special: Increase your _Guard_ by 2 against any _Punish_ attacks triggered by this Attack.

techniques.name: Armored Rebuke
techniques.desc: A foe's ineffectual attack causes them to stagger back off-balance.
techniques.trigger: An Attack _Misses_/_Grazes_ you.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Push_ 1, _Exposed_ 1 (Any 2 _Grit_/_Focus_) on the Attacker.
techniques.special: If your _Guard_ reduces the Damage of a Strike to 0, you may instead make a Basic Strike against the creature using an Unarmed Weapon.

techniques.name: Weighted Blow
techniques.desc: You follow up a melee strike by simply bringing your armored form to bear.
techniques.reqs: Heavy Armor Worn and must be Attached to a Melee Attack.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. If the Attack was _Hit_, add _Push_ 1, _Impair_ 2 (2 _Grit_) to the Attack. On a _Crit_, add _Prone_ and increase the Cost to _Negate_ by 1.

techniques.name: Steady
techniques.desc: You don't move quickly but the protection offered by your armor more than compensates.
techniques.effect: Gain _Staggered_ and _Grit_ 2.
techniques.boost: 2 _Grit_: Gain _Hobbled_ 1, but increase your _Guard_ by 1 until your next Turn.

techniques.name: Armored Charge
techniques.desc: You charge forward, using your armor as a weapon to smash forward.
techniques.move:
The movement granted by Free Run determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Step:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Reposition:</ins> Speed 2 
*  <ins>Shift:</ins> Speed 3
*  <ins>Sprint:</ins> Speed 5
techniques.effect: The Movement granted by this Technique must be taken in a straight line. You may make a Basic Strike with a Body Weapon against all creatures you move through with this Movement.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Guard_ by 2 for this Movement.

techniques.name: Glancing Blow
techniques.desc: You use your armor to knock an attack away, relying on your impenetrable shell.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked.
techniques.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 2. If the Attack Grazes, reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and increase your _Guard_ by 2 against this Attack.

techniques.name: Armored Shell
techniques.desc: You let a blow land solidly on your armor, unconcerned about the damage.
techniques.reqs: Light or Heavy Armor Worn with _Guard_ remaining.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked.
techniques.effect: Resolve the attack against your Armor rather than yourself, dealing an additional 1 Damage.

techniques.name: Lean In
techniques.desc: You trust entirely in your armor against an attack.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked.
techniques.effect: Increase your _Guard_ against the Attack by 2 and reduce the _Grit_ cost to _Negate_ by 1. Resolve the Attack against your Armor as well, but do not take any additional Damage or Status from it.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_: This does not use your Reaction.

techniques.name: Shrug Off
techniques.desc: Your heavy armor allows you to deflect conditions far easier than most.
techniques.trigger: You would gain _Bleed_ or an _Elemental Condition_.
techniques.effect: You may pay the cost to _Negate_ the triggering Condition using _Grit_. If it already cost _Grit_, reduce the cost to _Negate_ by 2.

name: Skirmisher
flavor: Skirmishers strike a balance between mobility and durability. While Skirmisher lacks the extreme mobility of the Freedom Discipline and the unstoppable armor of the Juggernaut, it excels at Punish Reactions. In addition, it has Techniques that allow options for both movement and enhanced defense, providing flexibility. A Skirmisher is equally adept at Evade and Block Reactions, and can use whichever fits the current situation.

stances.name: Counter Style
stances.desc: With your mix of mobility and armor you can more safely counter a foe's assault.
stances.accumulate: While Wearing Light Armor, once per Phase when you _Hit_/_Crit_ with a _Punish_ Reaction gain 1 Momentum.
stances.effect: While Wearing Light Armor, once per Phase, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to take an additional Reaction so long as at least one Reaction that turn is a _Counter_ Reaction.

stances.name: Skirmish Style
stances.desc: You are always moving, making yourself a difficult target to pin down.
stances.accumulate: While wearing Light Armor gain 1 _Momentum_ whenever you end your _Turn_ non-adjacent to any enemy.
stances.effect: Whenever you take a _Reaction_ while you have _Reflex_ you may Move 1 space as long as you are wearing Light Armor.
stances.special: Once per _Turn_, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to reduce the Cost of any _Evade_ Reaction by 1.

stances.name: Warding Style
stances.desc: You are most at home near a foe, using your mobility and armor to always press the advantage.
stances.accumulate: While wearing Light Armor gain 1 _Momentum_ whenever you end a _Turn_ adjacent to an enemy.
stances.effect: Whenever you take a _Reaction_ while you have _Grit_ you may reduce the Damage of an adjacent foe's Attack by 1.
stances.special: Once per _Turn_, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to reduce the Cost of any _Block_ Reaction by 1.

techniques.name: Press the Attack!
techniques.desc: With a balanced defense you can focus more of your attention on offense.
techniques.trigger: You make an Attack Roll.
techniques.effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 1.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Reflex_ or 1 _Grit_: Instead, increase the Attack Roll by 2.

techniques.name: Safe Counter
techniques.desc: You drive an attack towards your armor while slipping through a foe's defenses.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked by an adjacent enemy while wearing Light Armor.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Grit_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 3 or slower.
techniques.effect: You may immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_. Increase your _Guard_ by 1 against the triggering Attack.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.
techniques.special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes Step if it is greater than Step.

techniques.name: Spinning Counter
techniques.desc: You absorb an attack by a foe and whip about, striking a nearby foe.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked while wearing Light Armor.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_, 1 _Reflex_, +1 _Momentum_ if the Attack is Speed 4 or slower.
techniques.effect: Increase the Attack Roll by 1. You may immediately Attack with a _Maneuver_/_Weapon Strike_ against any creature other than the Triggering Target.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_.
techniques.special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes Step if it is greater than Step.

techniques.name: Leaping Strike
techniques.desc: You leap forward, making a mighty strike with your weapon as you land.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's Profile. Deal additional Damage equal to half the _Leaping_ distance covered. You may not Move after Attacking with this Technique.
techniques.special: If you begin the _Leap_ on higher _Elevation_ than the Target of the attack instead deal additional Damage equal to the full distance covered.

techniques.name: Adaptability
techniques.desc: You are able to adapt to any situation with your mix of mobility and strength.
techniques.effect: Gain any 3 of _Grit_ and _Reflex_. Gain 1 _Momentum_.

techniques.name: Rebalance
techniques.desc: You shift your combat style to become more balanced, .
techniques.effect: Trade as many _Grit_ Tokens for _Reflex_ or _Reflex_ Tokens for _Grit_ as you wish. If you end this Technique with more _Grit_ than _Reflex_ gain 1 additional _Grit_ and gain 3 Vigor. If you end this Technique with more _Reflex_ than _Grit_ gain 1 additional _Reflex_ and immediately take an additional _Safe_ Step. If you end this Technique with equal, non-zero amounts of _Grit_ and _Reflex_ gain 2 _Momentum_ and a +1 bonus on your next Attack Roll.

techniques.name: Rush
techniques.desc: You charge forward, smashing into a foe to give yourself an edge.
techniques.effect: Inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on a creature you end this Technique adjacent to. If you moved at least 5 spaces in a straight line before ending your turn adjacent, instead inflict _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Reflex_).
techniques.special: If you are wearing Heavy Armor, this is instead Speed 3.

techniques.name: Unhindered Run
techniques.desc: You dart forward at great speed, using your mix of agility and armor to ignore the hazards of the terrain.
techniques.move:
The movement granted by Unhindered Run determines its Speed, as follows: 
* <ins>Step, Step:</ins> Speed 1 
*  <ins>Reposition, Reposition:</ins> Speed 2 
* <ins>Shift, Shift:</ins> Speed 4
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: One portion of this Movement ignores the effects of Terrain. You may use this _Boost_ up to twice, paying the cost seperately each time.

techniques.name: Armored Roll
techniques.desc: You evade an assault while directing it towards a better protected part of your armor.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked.
techniques.effect: Force the attacker to reroll the attack. Either use the new result of the roll, or reduce the original roll by 1 and use it. Regardless of what you choose, you may _Safe_ Move 1 after this Reaction.

name: Shield Master
flavor: Your shield is an extension of your body, and none but the most determined attacks can make it past its defenses. Shield Masters are able to make use of their shield to better defend themselves and others, and allies that remain close to them are greatly rewarded. They also can make additional strikes with their Shield to spread Impaired among foes, limiting their ability to attack.

stances.name: Bash Style
stances.desc: Your shield is a vicious weapon, forcing foes to keep.
stances.accumulate: Once per Phase when you hit with a _Punish_ Attack using a Shield gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: When you hit with an Attack with your Shield, for the rest of the Round, the creature treats all _Impaired_ Tokens as if they had a value of 0 when attacking you, but a value one greater than normal when attacking other creatures.

stances.name: Bastion Style
stances.desc: A fighting style centered around the use of a shield to defend oneself and others.
stances.accumulate: Whenever an ally uses your _Grit_, gain 1 _Momentum_. This may trigger up to 3 times.
stances.effect: While you have a Shield Wielded you may choose to allow adjacent allies to spend your _Grit_ for Reactions. In addition, while you have a Shield Wielded, adjacent allies gain +1 _Guard_.

stances.name: Fortress Style
stances.desc: Your shield darts to and fro, .
stances.accumulate: Once per Phase when you take a _Block_ Reaction gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: While Wielding a Shield, once per _Phase_, you may pay 1 _Grit_ to take an additional _Reaction_ so long as at least one _Reaction_ that turn is a _Block_ Reaction.

techniques.name: Disruptive Bash
techniques.desc: You quickly smash into a foe with your shield, throwing off their attack.
techniques.trigger: An adjacent enemy Attacks a creature other than you.
techniques.effect: You may immediately Attack the triggering enemy with a Basic Strike using a Shield. On a _Hit_/_Crit_, reduce the triggering Attack Roll by 1.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. You may instead Attack with any _Strike_ but must still use a Shield.
1 _Reflex_: Trigger is instead 'An enemy within Step Range Attacks a creature.' So long as the triggering _Strike_ has at least Step Movement, you may Step Move as a part of this Reaction, but must use that Movement to end adjacent to the triggering foe.
1 _Grit_, 2 _Momentum_: Instead, the Trigger is 'An adjacent enemy Attacks.'
techniques.special: The Movement of the _Maneuver_/_Strike_ you choose becomes None.

techniques.name: Shield Charge
techniques.desc: You run forward with your shield held high, bashing through all in your path.
techniques.effect: Attack all creatures you move through with this Movement. If you _Hit_/_Crit_ increase your _Guard_ by one against any _Punish_ attacks by that creature this Turn.

techniques.name: Shield Bash
techniques.desc: You punctuate an attack with a quick bash of your shield to knock a foe backwards.
techniques.effect: Attack with your Shield's Profile. Add _Push_ 1 to the attack.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Replace all _Impaired_ inflicted by the Attack with _Exposed_.

techniques.name: Raise Guard
techniques.desc: You interpose your shield between yourself and a foe, enhancing your guard against them.
techniques.effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Choose a creature. Until the end of the Round reduce the Cost of all _Block_ Reactions against that Creature by 1.

techniques.name: Iron Wall
techniques.desc: Making use of a shield, you ready an unstoppable defense.
techniques.effect: Gain 3 _Grit_. For the remainder of the Round, adjacent allies gain _Cover_.

techniques.name: Sacrificial Shield
techniques.desc: You haphazardously throw up your shield, risking it's integrity to defend you.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked.
techniques.effect: Resolve the Attack against your Shield. Gain _Impaired_ 1.
techniques.boost: 2 _Grit_: Increase the Damage dealt by the Attack by 2, but when resolving the Attack against your Shield you do not take any Damage or Condition from the Attack.

techniques.name: Smash Back
techniques.desc: You smash a foe backwards as they strike, mitigating the damage of the blow.
techniques.trigger: An adjacent enemy makes an Attack.
techniques.effect: The triggering creature must pay 1 _Grit_ or reduce the Damage of the triggering Attack by 2. After resolving the Attack you may use the Shove Technique on the creature.
techniques.special: The Movement of Shove becomes None.

techniques.name: Vigilant Defender
techniques.desc: With the defensive prowess granted by your shield, you take a blow meant for another.
techniques.move: 0 _Reflex_ for Step, 1 _Reflex_ for Reposition, 2 _Reflex_ for Shift.
techniques.trigger: An ally within the Movement you paid for is Attacked.
techniques.effect: Immediately Move towards the ally by the shortest path possible, ending your move adjacent to the ally. You may use any Block Reactions against the triggering attack, resolving it as if you used it but granting the Target all the effects. Additionally, the Target gains your _Guard_ against the Attack.

techniques.name: Wide Guard
techniques.desc: You hold firm with your shield, stopping an effect from harming your allies.
techniques.trigger: You are hit with an Area of Effect attack.
techniques.effect: Reduce the Attack Roll by 1 for yourself and all adjacent allies. If the Area was a _Line_ it does not continue past your space. If it was a _Cone_, all allies in a _Cone_ 2 behind you are unaffected.
